Comment: By her own admission, Stacey Abrams has made a number of “personal financial missteps” in her career. Despite a history marked by bill collectors, tax liens, and ethics investigations, the Georgia politician and Democratic Party activist has managed to amass a small fortune – while working most of her career in the not-for-profit sector.   Amazing how she can do this, how does that work?
Author: Sure-Wishbone-4293

Comment: Why is this grifting overlooked? It’s maddening this is considered normal behavior for ANY politician.
Author: Flare4roach
